name: ORS National Invalid Key Dates for Non DTOs and Non Lifers
description:
This report returns the count by establishment of non-DTOs and non-Lifers with invalid key dates i.e. who have no ARD, CRD and NPD calculated dates in their Key Dates. Prisoners admitted into their current establishment up to 5 days ago are excluded.
PND0014 v4 Last Modified: 01/12/2020

dataset.name: Non Lifers and Non DTOs
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS AS IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH.CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH AS CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE AS CRD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE AS ARD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE AS NPD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE AS PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE, COUNT(DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY) AS COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.IMPRISONMENT_STATUSES AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, (SELECT B.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, B.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH AS CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS B WHERE B.CALCULATION_DATE = (SELECT MAX(A.CALCULATION_DATE) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE B.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS = 'Y' OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.LATEST_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS IN ('IN', 'OUT') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_BEGIN_DATE < TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - 5) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID = (SELECT MAX(A.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATION_ID) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID)) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH.CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH <> '00/00/00' AND NOT DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH.CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH IS NULL AND NOT AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS IN ('DTO', 'LIFE', 'DTO_YOI', 'ALP', 'DLP', 'DPP', 'HMP', 'HMPL', 'IPP', 'LR_IPP', 'LR_LIFE', 'MLP', 'SEC53', 'SEC90', 'SEC90_03', 'REFER', 'DTO_ORA', 'ALP_LASPO', 'DFL', 'LR_ALP', 'LR_ALP_LASPO', 'LR_DLP', 'LR_DPP', 'LR_MLP', 'SEC93', 'SEC93_03', 'SEC94', 'DTOR_104', 'DTOR_105', 'ALP_CODE18', 'ALP_CODE21', 'LR_ALP_CDE18', 'LR_ALP_CDE21', 'SEC275', 'SEC272') AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL AND AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL) AND (NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL OR NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL OR NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL OR NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, DT_CURR_SENTENCE_LENGTH.CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, IMPRISONMENT_STATUS, CURR_EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, CRD_CALCULATED_DATE, ARD_CALCULATED_DATE, NPD_CALCULATED_DATE, PRRD_CALCULATED_DATE, COUNT_NOMS_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Establishments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('All') OR 'All' IN ('All')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID FROM dataset_base_)

report.name: National Invalid Key Dates for Non DTOs and Non Lifers
